t: The*pn earth is the Lord*s ’s, and everything in it, the*ld world, and all who live in it;
for*ln he founded it on the seas and*ld established it on the waters.
Who*pn may ascend the mountain of the Lord?*s Who*ld may stand in his holy place?
The*ln one who has clean hands and a pure heart, who*ld does not trust in an idol or*ld swear by a false god.
They*pn will receive blessing from the Lord*s and*ld vindication from God their Savior.
Such*ln is the generation of those who seek him, who*ld seek your face, God of Jacob.
Lift*pn up your heads, you gates; be*ld lifted up, you ancient doors, that*ld the King of glory may come in.
Who*ln is this King of glory? The*ld Lord*s strong and mighty, the*ld Lord*s mighty in battle.
Lift*ln up your heads, you gates; lift*ld them up, you ancient doors, that*ld the King of glory may come in.
Who*ln is he, this King of glory? The*ld Lord*s Almighty— he*ld is the King of glory.
